voice_url.description: URL to which Telnyx will deliver your XML Translator webhooks.

voice_fallback_url.description: URL to which Telnyx will deliver your XML Translator webhooks if we get an error response from your voice_url.

voice_method.description: HTTP request method Telnyx will use to interact with your XML Translator webhooks. Either 'get' or 'post'.

status_callback.description: URL for Telnyx to send requests to containing information about call progress events.

status_callback_method.description: HTTP request method Telnyx should use when requesting the status_callback URL.

channel_limit.description: When set, this will limit the total number of inbound calls to phone numbers associated with this connection.

shaken_stir_enabled.description: When enabled Telnyx will include Shaken/Stir data in the Webhook for new inbound calls.

sip_subdomain.description: Specifies a subdomain that can be used to receive Inbound calls to a Connection, in the same way a phone number is used, from a SIP endpoint. Example: the subdomain "example.sip.telnyx.com" can be called from any SIP endpoint by using the SIP URI "sip:@example.sip.telnyx.com" where the user part can be any alphanumeric value. Please note TLS encrypted calls are not allowed for subdomain calls.

sip_subdomain_receive_settings.description: This option can be enabled to receive calls from: "Anyone" (any SIP endpoint in the public Internet) or "Only my connections" (any connection assigned to the same Telnyx user).

channel_limit.description: When set, this will limit the total number of outbound calls to phone numbers associated with this connection.
